headline: Datadog Ranked on Forbes' Global 2000 List, Recognizing Global Impact and Financial Strength
summary: New York, New York--(Newsfile Corp. - June 20, 2025) - Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications, today announced it has ranked on the Forbes Global 2000 and Forbes Global 2000 United States Lists for 2025. Datadog's addition recognizes the company's global impact and financial strength.Forbes' annual ranking measures the world's largest companies based on sales, profits, assets and market value.
